## CssManager.handleStyleTextDom() method

处理 style 下的文本元素

**Signature:**

```typescript
static handleStyleTextDom(module: Module, dom: RenderedDom): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  module | [Module](./nodom3.module.md) | 模块 |
|  dom | [RenderedDom](./nodom3.rendereddom.md) | style text element |

**Returns:**

boolean

如果是styleTextdom返回true，否则返回false
